verses.verse: O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Let them <S%H4994>now<s%> that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
I called <S%H7121>upon<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H4480>in<s%> <S%H4712>distress:<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> me, and set me in a large <S%H4800>place.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is on my side; I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3372>fear:<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> can <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto me?
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> taketh my part with them that <S%H5826>help<s%> me: therefore shall <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> my desire upon them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me.
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> than to put <S%H4480>confidence<s%> <S%H982><s%> in <S%H120>man.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> than to put <S%H4480>confidence<s%> <S%H982><s%> in <S%H5081>princes.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> compassed me <S%H5437>about:<s%> but in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will I <S%H4135>destroy<s%> them.
They compassed me <S%H5437>about;<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> they compassed me <S%H5437>about:<s%> but in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> I will <S%H4135>destroy<s%> them.

They compassed me <S%H5437>about<s%> like <S%H1682>bees;<s%> they are <S%H1846>quenched<s%> as the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H6975>thorns:<s%> for in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> I will <S%H4135>destroy<s%> them.
Thou hast thrust <S%H1760>sore<s%> <S%H1760><s%> at me that I might <S%H5307>fall:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> me.
The <S%H3050>LORD<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song,<s%> and is <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>rejoicing<s%> and <S%H3444>salvation<s%> is in the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%>
The right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted:<s%> the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%>
I shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%>
The <S%H3050>LORD<s%> hath chastened me <S%H3256>sore:<s%> <S%H3256><s%> but he hath <S%H3808>not<s%> given me <S%H5414>over<s%> unto <S%H4194>death.<s%>
Open <S%H6605><s%> to me the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> I will <S%H935>go<s%> into them, and I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> the LORD: <S%H3050><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> into which the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H935>enter.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> thou hast <S%H6030>heard<s%> me, and art <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
The <S%H68>stone<s%> which the <S%H1129>builders<s%> <S%H3988>refused<s%> is <S%H1961>become<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> stone of the <S%H6438>corner.<s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4480>doing;<s%> <S%H854><s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> in our <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>made;<s%> we will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in it.
Save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> thee, send <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H6743>prosperity.<s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be he that <S%H935>cometh<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> we have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you out of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

God <S%H410><s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which hath showed us <S%H215>light:<s%> <S%H631>bind<s%> the <S%H2282>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H5688>cords,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
Thou <S%H859><s%> art my <S%H410>God,<s%> and I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee: thou art my <S%H430>God,<s%> I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> thee.
O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
